alert.note: Alert for Bannock; Bingham; Bonneville; Fremont; Jefferson; Madison; Power (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued November 09 at 7:28AM MST until November 09 at 8:30AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southwestern Fremont County in southeastern Idaho... Southeastern Jefferson County in southeastern Idaho... Northwestern Bannock County in southeastern Idaho... Central Power County in southeastern Idaho... Northwestern Bonneville County in southeastern Idaho... Western Madison County in southeastern Idaho... Central Bingham County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 830 AM MST. * At 728 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from Menan to near Fort Hall Bannock Creek Lodge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous and life-threatening travel conditions are expected to develop rapidly in the warning area. * Travel around and between Rexburg, Idaho Falls, INL, Blackfoot, Fort Hall, Pocatello, and American Falls could be treacherous. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Pocatello, Rexburg, Blackfoot, American Falls, Rigby, American Falls Reservoir, Neeley, Lorenzo, Goshen, Chubbuck, Ammon, Shelley, Aberdeen, Iona, Sugar City, Ucon, Inkom, Menan and Roberts. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.

area.areaDesc: Bannock; Bingham; Bonneville; Fremont; Jefferson; Madison; Power
